page.title: 05LLANDERLO CONTINUED
page.content:
All inhabitants have use of doctors surgery and clinic in Llanderlo. Some retired people are suffering from the drawbacks of physical deterioration of old age, eg arthritis, mental and other disablities. One mentally retarded man is provided with a home with the social worker.
Home Life The daily life of most is based above the needs f the farm, usually early rising and bedding. fuels vary, wood coal calor gas, oil, electricity, Cookers, electric, calor gas, Aga types ranges. Most have deep freezers, refrigerators. Nearly all have central heating in addition to fires for warmth and hot water. There are domestic cats and dogs. Some farms have ponies.
